KFunction.Name: k2_pad
KFunction.Desc: This function will pad the i_pad_string to i_str according to i_pad_length and $i_pad_type

Input.name: i_pad_string
Input.Comment: The i_pad_string may be truncated if the required number of padding characters can't be evenly divided by the pad_string's length

Input.name: i_pad_length
Input.Comment: If the value of i_pad_length is negative, less than, or equal to the length of the input string, no padding takes place.

Input.name: i_pad_type
Input.Comment: Optional argument i_pad_type can be STR_PAD_RIGHT, STR_PAD_LEFT, or STR_PAD_BOTH. If pad_type is not specified it is assumed to be STR_PAD_RIGHT
